Not that many rules, this is my first story:
1. Try not to kill anybody.
2. Try to keep the story to your point of view.
3. No super powers that aren't linked to the stone.
4. Anything else goes, I don't care what you throw in (but if it's seriously stupid, than it's a no)

Oh yeah. Also, please, please, PLEASE, don't make the main character a complete jerk. He can do jerkish things every now and then, but don't make him the jerk of the century. If it's funny or entertaining, then fine. But, nobody wants to read about how some guy humiliated others for fun and got no retribution. If you make him a jerk, make retribution.

Please, well over 2000 view but no additions or reviews. Please add or tell me what you think should be changed or added in. Please don't make me do all the work.
Last thing: for every chapter (doesn't have to be long but it has to be legit) I'll try to put in two chapters. My internet sucks (I live in Germany) so I can only keep up so well
